title: The Mammalian story: the beginning of life (Japan)
creator_credit: Rokuro Hayashi, Cine-science and Jun-Ichiro Takeda
brief_description: Examines the development of the mammal. Considers aspects of cell division and the nature of chromosomes and heredity. Looks in detail at the reproductive organs of the male and female, fertilization and the growth of the embryo. This film makes excellent use of photomicrography to record development of the embryo. Narrated by Brian McInerney.
